full_summary:
#############################################
### Government Tender Announcement Malaysia - GS18
=====================================================

### Tender Details
---------------

### Tender Reference
-------------------

*   M5000-222226
*   WS3580651069
*   M5000-222226 - Leica GS18 T ROVERS DE RÉALIGNEMENT DES GNSS (Title)
*   WS3580651069 - Leica GS18 T GNSS Tilting Rovers (English)

### Tender Expiry
---------------

*   **Closing Date:** 2022-11-23 14:00:00 ET
*   **Current Status:** Exired

### Brief Overview
-----------------

Canada is seeking vendors to supply and deliver Leica GS18 Tilting Rover Units and Leica GS16 Base Units to meet the Government of Canada's requirements. The bid is open to organizations who can provide discounted or varied rates for the equipment and services, and shall have the required equipment available for immediate delivery.

### Goods and Services Required
-----------------------------

*   Leica GS18 T GNSS Tilting Rover Units (12 units)
*   Leica GS16 Base Units (4 units)
*   Related Accessories

### Delivery Location
--------------------

*   Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada

### Contracting Entity
----------------------

*   Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Address: 11, Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

### Contact
------------

*   Eric Tran
*   Email: [eric.tran@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:Eric.tran@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   Phone: Not Available
*   Fax: Not Available
*   Address: Not Available

### Attachments
---------------

None

Note:
*   This is a Request for Proposal, which is evaluated on the bid that includes the Lowest Price responsive bid submitted.
*   Reponses received after 14:00 EST on November 23, 2022, will be declared non-responsive.
*   Interested bidders are required to submit all required supporting documentation and VIN information for evaluation. Binary files must be password-protected. 

**To submit your bid, go to [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14399131/](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14399131/).** 
===================================================== END ITEM ======================================

Note:
